result.msg: Must be used before SparkInterpreter (%spark) initialized

paragraphs.text:
val options = Map("start" -> "10", "end" -> "28")
val df = sqlContext.load("com.fluxcapacitor.pipeline.spark.sql.IntegerRangeRelationProvider", options)
df.registerTempTable("ints")
